name: PortalPrimitive
description: 툴팁을 DOM 트리 외부에 렌더링하는 포털

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: keepMounted
props.description: Whether to keep the portal mounted in the DOM while the popup is hidden.

props.name: container
props.description: A parent element to render the portal element into.
